title: A vital US-Canadian border crossing reopens after trucker blockade of Ambassador Bridge is cleared - CNN
content:
1. A vital US-Canadian border crossing reopens after trucker blockade of Ambassador Bridge is cleared  CNN
  2. Canadian police begin arresting protesters blocking US-Canada bridge  Fox News
  3. Police move in to arrest protesters blockading Canada-U.S. bridge  NBC News
  4. Canada Opens Blockaded Bridge, but in Ottawa, Truckers Wonâ€™t Budge  The New York Times
  5. Protestors rally against the Canadian trucker vaccine mandate near the Peace Bridge in Buffalo  WIVB.com - News 4
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: North America's busiest land border crossing has reopened after a nearly weeklong blockade by protesters decrying Covid-19 mandates crippled the key trade route, while demonstrators in the nation's capital are expected to begin shifting out of residential areas Monday.
